categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: "Night Stalker" Raxine was a female Sith who lived around the time of the Cold War.

Raxine was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with the Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for the Dark vs. Light system. Whenever the dark side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Night Stalker Raxine has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Hoth alongside other Dark Side World Bosses.
